title: Best of The Herd: 12/18/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/18/2018
description:
Colin thinks Cam Newton is the Russell Westbrook of the NFL because he is a talented yet inefficient player that is becoming increasingly injured. He thinks Andrew Luck is the MVP of the NFL and explains why. Plus, former NFL QB Drew Bledsoe talks about why rookie QBs have had so much early success and why he didn't have the luxuries they do. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
